allow: Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "try { $null = [System.Management.Automation.Language.Parser]::ParseFile\(''G:\\My Drive\\00 - Trajanus USA\\00-Command-Center\\05-Scripts\\trajanus_monitor.ps1'', [ref]$null, [ref]$null\); Write-Host ''SYNTAX OK'' } catch { Write-Host ""ERROR: $_"" }")

Bash(powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { Set-Location ''G:\\My Drive\\00 - Trajanus USA\\00-Command-Center\\05-Scripts''; Write-Host ''Testing script parse...''; $script = Get-Content ''trajanus_monitor.ps1'' -Raw; $errors = $null; $tokens = $null; [void][System.Management.Automation.Language.Parser]::ParseInput\($script, [ref]$tokens, [ref]$errors\); if \($errors.Count -eq 0\) { Write-Host ''SYNTAX OK - No parse errors'' } else { Write-Host ''ERRORS:''; $errors | ForEach-Object { Write-Host $_.Message } } }")
